results.title: Report a missed bin
results.snippet: If your street has been missed but isn't listed as a known disruption, you can report the missed collection using our online form below.

results.title: Disruptions to bin collections
results.snippet: ... report a missed bin online. Current disruptions. If your bin has been missed and your street is listed below, please leave it out and we'll come back for ...

results.title: Bins, rubbish and recycling
results.snippet: Order a bin · Get an extra grey, blue or brown bin · Bulky waste collections · Ask for a new bin collection · Report a missed bin · Report a spilled bin.

results.title: Tell us about it
results.snippet: Report something to us. This could be things such as child or adult abuse, missed bins, fly-tipping or potholes.

results.title: Report a spilled bin
results.snippet: Report a spilled bin if we've spilled any waste when we were emptying your bins.

results.title: Home Services Contact us
results.snippet: (Please don't use this form to tell us about a missed bin collection, as these reports won't be actioned or responded to. Visit our bins, rubbish and recycling ...

selected_links.title: Report a missed bin
strengths: Directs users to an online form for reporting a missed bin collection
Information provided about conditions for reporting a missed bin
selected_links.reasoning: This link leads to a dedicated webpage for reporting a missed bin, which suggests it is the primary resource for customers seeking information on this topic.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content does not directly provide a method for reporting a missed individual bin collection due on the same day. However, it informs that if all bins on the road have been missed, residents can report it using an online form.
Reason.reasoning: The content mentions 'If your street has been missed but isn't listed as a known disruption, you can report the missed collection using our online form below.', but unfortunately, there is no explicit mention of individual bin collections that were missed on the same day.
Reason.next_actions: Search for more specific content or contact the local council directly to report a missed individual bin collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides general information about reporting a missed bin collection, but lacks clarity and details on how to handle missed collections of individual bins that were scheduled for the same day. Key gaps include specific procedures for handling mistakes by residents and clear communication channels for urgent collection requests.
